Vision Mission Purpose About
← Purpose [PREV]

We are an international network of professionals, businesses and universities working together to define a sustainable business solution at today’s core travel industry issues (e.g. economic, social, educational).

Our core values are based on radical openness, transparency, empowerment and clarity and we practice them in order to be a healthy, free and autonomous business organization. If you like what we do, please join the conversation by writing to us at act@dede.is.
